name: contributions
description: Number of contributions in this quarter made by this author as member of `author_org_name` and included within `project`.

name: cum_net_sum
description: Sum of commits used to compute onion.

name: data_source
description: Data source name for which Onion is computed.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Corresponds to timeframe. It is used like an alias through all data sources to identify the field we rely on to sort things in time series and filter events when using Kibana's time picker.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Time when item was enriched to be stored in this index.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Time when most recent item of current quarter was written in ElasticSearch (index time in source index).

name: onion_role
description: Core, regular or casual, see study description in https://github.com/chaoss/grimoirelab-elk/blob/master/doc/studies.md.

name: quarter
description: Quarter as String following format YYYYQN.

name: timeframe
description: Date corresponding to quarter start time.
